newUserText:
Hi! Did you hear your intro?
 You can update it by replying to this message with the following command:
    `set-intro <introname>` 
 Where the options for <introname> can be listed by running `list-intros`

If you do not want an intro to play when you join voice channels then use: `disable-intro`
helpText: The following is a list of all commands available:
